channel.description: Recent content on AK's Internet Home

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi I am Anurag Kale and this is my front door on the internet. I am a Cloud Consultant / Cloud Architect who loved to wrangle with everything related to data. I help companies to embrace cloud for their workloads. As of Sept 2021, I have worked in IT for 7+ years. My Employment History: Cybercom Group (acquired by Knowit), Sweden as Cloud Consultant / AWS Solutions Architect. Helping customers with their cloud strategy, implementation and solution design.
